about_the_game:
In this 2D bullet hell shooter, you will fight through endless rooms of enemies, gain powerups, and fight difficult bosses. Each room presents a new challenge, with many room layouts and enemy patterns that keep the gameplay fresh and unpredictable. As you progress, you'll discover a variety of items, each offering unique abilities and strategies. The game's fast-paced action and tight controls ensure that every encounter is intense and rewarding.

Key Features:

- Dynamic Combat: Face off against rooms of enemies with different attack patterns and behaviors.

- Power-Up System: Collect and combine various power-ups to enhance your weapons and abilities.

- Challenging Boss Fights: Test your skills against powerful bosses, each with their own distinct moves and tactics.

- Endless Levels: Endless mode lets you keep playing forever.

- Retro Aesthetic: Enjoy a vibrant, pixel-art style inspired by classic arcade shooters.

name: Generic Space Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (e.g., Intel HD Graphics 4000) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 90 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any standard sound card
  • VR Support: Not Supported
  • Additional Notes: The game should run on most low-end systems, but performance may vary depending on hardware.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Shoot your enemies! Acquire items! Fight Geometrical Bosses! In this exciting 2D bullet hell shooter, you will fight through infinite hordes of enemies, gather game changing items, and face off against vicious bosses!
